mapper.select: SELECT /* homes.popup.vo.selectChernmCount 공통팝업(담당자조회) 전체카운트 조회 */ COUNT(1) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM tb_cm_commuser WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{usernm}, '%') LIMIT #{stno}, #{edno}

SELECT /* homes.popup.vo.selectChernmList 공통팝업(담당자조회) */ USER_NO AS USERNO , USER_NM AS USERNM , USER_ROLE AS USER_ROLE , CASE WHEN USER_ROLE = 'ADM001' THEN '총괄관리자' ELSE '관리자' END AS USER_ROLENM , USER_STTUS AS USER_STTUS , CASE WHEN USER_STTUS = 'UST001' THEN '승인' ELSE '' END AS USER_STTUSNM FROM tb_cm_commuser WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT(#{usernm}, '%') LIMIT #{stno}, #{edno}
